name: Desperate Counter (V)
Lore: 'The Empire relied on the skill of its pilot corps to defend the Death Star reactor core from attack.',
Text: 'Unless Imperial Propaganda on table, if you are about to lose Force during opponent''s control phase, deploy on table to reduce loss by 4 (ignore other modifiers); opponent may immediately take any one card into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. [Immune to Control]. OR Use 2 Force to deploy on table and stack one just-played interrupt here.',
